Question
========

x is the mean and Y is the standard deviation of a set of measurements that is normally distributed. What then is the percentage outside x +- 1.2Y of these measurements?

Answerlist
----------

* 23%
* 34%
* 68%
* 95%
* 99%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 23%: Correct
* 34%: Incorrect
* 68%: Incorrect
* 95%: Incorrect
* 99%: Incorrect
